name: Đinh Duy Tự (TuDD)
about: Determined hard worker with experience in developing software applications and websites. Long-term interests include web applications and mobile applications.

projects.name: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Maintain and upgrade an e-commerce website based on EC-Orange core version 2.x for clothing sales as per customer requirements. Tasks include product customization, calculating estimated shipping dates, integrating payment methods like SBPS and .com, upgrading system components (PHP version, AWS, Postfix, etc.), migrating the operating system from CentOS to Red Hat, and enhancing authentication processes.
projects.lang: PHP / Laravel / Node.js / MySQL / GraphQL / AWS

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Developed a new e-commerce website using EC-Orange core version 4.x, tailored for selling clothing to students in a school. The platform allows shops to register and upload products, enabling students to browse and purchase clothing items directly on the website.

projects.name: Maintain and Upgrade Law Book Rental System
projects.description: Responsible for maintaining and upgrading an online law book reading and rental system. Key features include uploading books, renting books, online reading with support for bookmarking pages and highlighting important lines. Also optimized performance for faster book loading and improved reading experience, enhanced security to protect copyrighted content, and improved UI/UX for a smoother rental and reading process.

projects.name: Learning Management System
projects.description: Responsible for developing and maintaining a learning management system. Features include managing classes and courses, watching video lectures, taking tests, chatting with instructors, participating in scheduled exams, and tracking study results with monthly and yearly statistics.

projects.name: Dating App
projects.description: Developed an online dating and matching app with various features including location-based matching, chat, video calls (using Agora), top-up, account upgrades, donations via in-app purchases, withdrawal, and explicit content detection through Google Cloud Vision. The app offers a seamless and secure user experience for online dating.
projects.lang: PHP / Laravel / MySQL / React Native / AWS

projects.name: E-Commerce
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce website for clothing. In addition to purchasing on the website, products are synchronized and uploaded to various e-commerce platforms such as Yahoo, Wowma, Rakuten, and Amazon, enabling wider product visibility and sales.

projects.name: Learning Management System
projects.description: The application enables users to schedule and plan their study through video lectures. Each video includes multiple exercises for practice, with MathJax integration for displaying charts and mathematical formulas. It records results and analyzes learning progress by month and year. Additionally, the app features a chat room where students can discuss, exchange ideas, and directly ask questions to instructors.
projects.lang: PHP / Laravel / MySQL / React Native / AWS

experience.title: Backend Developer
experience.description: join Open Education training course on PHP and Laravel at Sun* Inc Viet Nam

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
education.institution: Hanoi University of Business and Technology

additionalInfo.text: Proficient in Docker, Linux, Nginx, and Apache.
Knowledgeable in Unit Testing and Automation Testing.
